Mellow vibrations… delicious sounds of white energy slopping over the cosmic shores. K’Chru hear and eat. A short walk… and we can satiate… more.
柔和的振动……白色能量在宇宙海岸上飞溅的美妙声音。战争聆听和进食。一小段路……我们就可以……更满足。

Shoals of Psi-Fish are emerging from the Void barrier, swarming over the Assembly colonies. It seems they have been attracted by the substance we have been brewing together. If our elixir was their appetizer, the Assembly are now their main dish. What a severe blow against our enemy!
成群的灵能水母从虚空屏障中冒出来，聚集在半机械人的殖民地上。看来它们被我们酿造的物质所吸引了。如果我们的灵药是他们的开胃菜，那么半机械人就是它们的主菜了。多么沉重的打击！
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
Give it up, T4R0N 0F 960S3 T1MUR! Hand over your weapons, and the lives of your remaining troops can be spared.
放弃吧，T4R0N 0F 960S3 T1MUR！交出你的武器，你剩下的部队还能免于一死。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

Your self-assurance amuses me! Why should I surrender now, when the hour of our greatest triumph is near? For soon the United Generations of the Assembly will lay their claim on nothing less than Union Prime itself!
你的自信令我感到愉悦！我们即将取得最伟大的胜利，我为何要投降？很快，半机械人联合世代就将凌驾于联盟主星之上！

Story message. Speaker: "T4R0N 0F 960US3 T1MUR" (Assembly male; previously Syndicate with the name "Taron of House Timur") "United Generations of the Assembly" is the name of a galactic empire. "Union Prime" is the name of a planet.
Union Prime, the capital world that was created to rule them all? You are delusional! The planet has been devoured by the Calaclysm and is lost for all eternity.
联盟主星？那个为了统治他们而建立的首府星球？别痴心妄想了！那个星球早就被大灾难吞噬，已经永远地失去了。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female) For "Cataclysm" see the corresponding glossary entry.

There is no limit to the Assembly’s potential, subject Theta-39667. With the help of the data provided by our Apostate allies we discovered that Union Prime still exists within the Void. It is lingering there, in cosmic stasis, like a stranded whale waiting to get pulled back into the ocean.
半机械人的潜力是无限的，泽塔-39667 号对象。在变节者盟友提供的数据帮助下，我们发现联盟主星仍然存在于虚空之中。它就徘徊在那里，停滞在宇宙中，就像一条搁浅的鲸鱼，等待被拖回大海。
Story message. Speaker: "T4R0N 0F 960US3 T1MUR" (Assembly male; previously Syndicate with the name "Taron of House Timur")
Now behold and witness the activation of the L0G3N-Shaw Grapple. Where one cord fails, the combined strength of a million will lift up even a colossus!
现在，亲眼见证罗根-肖巨钩的启动吧！一根绳子的力量虽然弱小，但一百万根绳子拧起来将能举起巨像！
Story message. Speaker: "T4R0N 0F 960US3 T1MUR" (Assembly male; previously Syndicate with the name "Taron of House Timur") "L0G3N-Shaw Grapple" is the name of a huge in story device.
The tremors, the permanent lightning from the Void… it is just like the other Paladins described. I am beginning to understand… the Equisat of Verdrice is not even your target – it is just an anchor!
这震颤，这来自虚空的永恒闪电……就像其他帕拉丁所描述的一样。我开始明白了……维德瑞斯御骑星甚至不是你的目标，这里只是一个锚点而已！
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
Very good! Your brain may be of some use to us after all! You are too late to stop us, subject Theta-39667. Join us or fight us – Reassembly awaits, one way or another.
很好！你的大脑也许对我们还有些用处！妄图阻止我们已经太迟了，泽塔-39667 号对象。要么加入我们，要么与我们战斗。无论如何，改造都会降临。
Story message. Speaker: "T4R0N 0F 960US3 T1MUR" (Assembly male; previously Syndicate with the name "Taron of House Timur")
T4R0N and his Assembly are no longer, yet there is little reason for celebration. The people of this world cannot be considered safe while their planet is chained to the Void with an energy lash.
T4R0N 和他的半机械人已不复存在，但我们几乎没有值得庆祝的理由。这个星球上人民的安全还未得到保障，因为这里被某种能量与虚空拴在了一起。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
Still, you did well, Examinee {STR_LeaderFirstName}. I have forwarded my compilation of your deeds and findings to the High Paladius. He is requesting your presence on Archanon-8.
你如往常一样做得很好，试炼者{STR_LeaderFirstName}。我将你的发现与功绩发给了圣帕拉迪乌斯，他要求你前往阿查农-8 号星。
Story message. Speaker: "Vrascal the Seer" (Oathbound, male) For "High Paladius" see the corresponding glossary entry.
Archanon-8… the seat of the Circle – and Oracle. I am honored to receive such a generous invitation. But I must decline – the people of this planet need my protection!
阿查农-8 号……英雄议会所在地，甚至连神谕也在那里。我很荣幸收到如此慷慨的邀请，但我必须拒绝，这个星球上的人民需要我的保护！
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

Your abilities have been deemed apt to serve a greater good, Equis {STR_LeaderName}. Accept this new calling! There are other Paladins, who can carry on your duties here, while the Void anchors of the Assembly are a responsibility best left to us Seers.
你的能力获得了认可，应该为更伟大的事业效力，{STR_LeaderName}御骑。响应新的召唤吧！其他帕拉丁可以承担你的职责，至于半机械人的虚空锚点，最好还是留给我们预言者去处理。
Story message. Speaker: "Vrascal the Seer" (Oathbound, male)
And one last thing before we part: the base of the Assembly holds important fragments of their Void technology. It could proof useful for you in the challenges ahead.
分别前还有最后一件事：半机械人的基地中藏有重要的虚空科技碎片，这些东西对你今后的挑战可能会大有用处。
Story message. Speaker: "Vrascal the Seer" (Oathbound, male)

Thank you, Vrascal. I wouldn’t have made it here without your counsel. The Celestian teachings will always stay a part of who I am, but I must prepare for the next time I will face the Assembly. Their Voidtech machinery shall not surprise us a second time.
谢谢你，瓦拉斯卡。若是没有你的忠告，我不可能有今天的成就。星神的教导将永远是我的一部分，但我必须为下一次面对半机械人时做好准备。他们的虚空科技机器将不再让我们吃惊了。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

Thank you, Vrascal. I wouldn’t have made it here without your counsel. But this time, I must stay true to my Celestian roots. They are the source of my courage and inner strength, and my best protection in the ongoing war with the Assembly.
谢谢你，瓦拉斯卡。若是没有你的忠告，我不可能有今天的成就。但这一次，我必须忠于我的星神之道，它我的勇气和内在力量的源泉，也是我在与半机械人的持续战争中最佳的保护。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
胜利条件：瓦拉斯卡必须存活
A header name of a task. For "Seer" see the corresponding glossary entry. "Vrascal" is the first name of a male Oathbound character.
Vrascal the Seer must survive. If you lose your judge of honor, it will surely fall back on you. The protection of the planet would become another Paladin's duty, making you lose the mission.
预言者瓦拉斯卡必须存活。如果你失去了这位荣誉判官，你将无法逃脱责任。保护这个星球将成为另一名帕拉丁的职责，而你将失去这个任务。
A task description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
Examinee {STR_LeaderFirstName}, there is another incoming transmission from Equis Denard. He insisted in putting it through to you.
试炼者{STR_LeaderFirstName}，我们收到了另一段来自德纳尔御骑的讯息，他坚持要将此消息送达于你。
Story message. Speaker: "Vrascal the Seer" (Oathbound, male)

To the spectators of my triumph: by the time this message reaches you, I shall have already expunged 4 Hopperhound Dens, 2 Quartzite Nests and slain the Great Worm of Leddigor Island. You may all clap your hands and stand in awe of my admirable deeds.
献给见证我胜利的观众们：当你们收到这个消息的时候，我已经肃清了四个跳蝗巢穴和两个石英岩兽巢穴，还杀死了莱迪格尔岛上的巨型蠕虫。对我的壮举起立致敬，并报以热烈的掌声吧。

Story message. Speaker: "Equis Denard" (Oathbound male) "Hopperhound Den" is the name of an in game structure. "Qzartizte Nest" is the name of an in game structure. "Leddigor Island" is the name of an island.

It is good to hear that you are faring well on your adventures, Equis Denard. I myself need to shield my loyal citizens from an equally dangerous foe. The Assembly dropped from the sky with their barges of half-dead organ harvesters. They cannot be reasoned with.
很高兴听到你的冒险进展顺利，德纳尔御骑。我需要保护忠诚的人民躲避同样危险的敌人，半机械人正带着他们半死不活的器官收割者从天而降，我们根本无法和他们讲道理。
That is grim news, Equis Burceau! May your lance prevail and push those terrifying cyborgs back to the wastelands from whence they came!
真是个坏消息，布尔索御骑！愿你的长矛所向披靡，把那些丑陋的半机械人赶回他们原本的荒原！
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
Examinee {STR_LeaderFirstName}, there is yet another transmission from Equis Denard. He seems more than eager to share his progress.
试炼者{STR_LeaderFirstName}，还有另一段来自德纳尔御骑的讯息，他似乎非常渴望分享他的进展。
Story message. Speaker: "Vrascal the Seer" (Oathbound, male)
Bravely bold Equis Denard[br/]flew forth from Elbersted.[br/]He was not afraid to die, brave Equis Denard.[br/]He was not at all afraid to kill monsters many ways,[br/]brave brave brave Equis Denard.
勇敢大胆的御骑德纳尔[br/]从埃博斯泰德飞出。[br/]勇敢的御骑德纳尔不惧死亡。[br/]他并不害怕杀死各种怪物，[br/]勇敢、勇敢、勇敢的御骑德纳尔。
Story message. Speaker: "Equis Denard" (Oathbound male) This is a nod to the song "bravely bold Syr Robin" in "Monthy Python and the holy grail".

When the Assembly reared its ugly head,[br/]he bravely rescued Elbersted.[br/]Yes, Equis Denard took them on[br/]and gallantly saved everyone![br/]With sword and shield and iron feet[br/]he made the Assembly retreat![br/]Bravest of the brave, Equis Denard!
当半机械人抬起丑陋的头，[br/]他勇敢地救下了埃博斯泰德。[br/]是啊，御骑德纳尔解决了他们[br/]并勇敢地拯救了所有人！[br/]手持剑盾，脚踏钢足[br/]他击退了半机械人！[br/]勇者中的勇者，御骑德纳尔！
Story message. Speaker: "Equis Denard" (Oathbound male) This is a nod to the song "bravely bold Syr Robin" in "Monthy Python and the holy grail".

I applaud you, Equis Denard, to this victory over the Assembly! More and more planets are being threatened by their plans of world domination.[br/][br/]I am sure Equis Burceau will be interested to hear, in detail, which weapons and strategies helped you prevail.
我向你表示称赞，德纳尔御骑，为你对半机械人的胜利表示祝贺！越来越多的星球正受到半机械人统治世界计划的威胁。[br/][br/]我相信布尔索御骑将会很想知道哪些武器和策略能够帮助取得胜利。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

A Paladin’s greatest weapon is his courage! But the battle for the Equisat of Denard is not over yet. The Assembly keep resisting my glorious charge, though undoubtedly not for long! I can indeed give plenty of advice to you, Equis Burceau.[br/][br/]Equis Burceau…?
帕拉丁最强大的武器是勇气！不过德纳尔御骑星上的战斗还没有结束，半机械人还在抵抗我光荣的冲锋，但他们坚持不了太久了！我确实可以给你很多建议，布尔索御骑。[br/][br/]布尔索御骑……？

Equis Burceau is not available to answer your questions at this moment. And frankly he will stay busy for quite a while. We need every disposable individual to set up the L0G3N-Shaw Grapple on this planet.
布尔索御骑现在无法回答你的问题。坦率地说，他将在相当长一段时间内保持忙碌状态了。我们需要所有能派上用场的人在这个星球上部署罗根-肖巨钩。
Story message. Speaker: "6R0XA-4" (Assembly, female) "L0G3N-Shaw Grapple" is the name of a huge in story device.
You monsters! Don’t think your aggressive expansion will grant you any lasting victories! We will keep resisting!
你们这些怪物！不要以为侵略性的扩张会给你带来长久的胜利！我们将继续抵抗！
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

Resist all you like. For the Assembly, disconnected body parts are just as valuable as the entire subject. Reassembly will come to everyone. Make your choice of whether it will happen to you sooner or later.
随你们抵抗吧。对半机械人来说，破碎的身体部位与完整的身体同样具有价值。改造会降临所有人，你们的抵抗只不过是在延缓它的到来而已。
Story message. Speaker: "6R0XA-4" (Assembly, female) "Reassembly" is the name of the process when a non-Assembly person gets turned into an Assembly.
Examinee {STR_LeaderFirstName}, there is word from Equis Denard. He has news for you regarding the Assembly.
试炼者{STR_LeaderFirstName}，有一条来自德纳尔御骑的讯息，他有关于半机械人的消息要告诉你。
Story message. Speaker: "Vrascal the Seer" (Oathbound, male)

Worry not, Equis {STR_LeaderName}. While it does not avenge what happened to the poor Equis Burceau, I have vanquished the Assembly and removed them from my planet for good! Now my Seer judge is investigating the strange Void device which they activated.
不用担心，{STR_LeaderName}御骑。虽然我并没有为可怜的布尔索御骑报仇，但我已经征服了半机械人，并把他们彻底赶出了我的星球！现在，我的预言者判官正在调查半机械人激活的奇异虚空装置。
But in the meantime, my exceptional talents are needed elsewhere. I have been summoned to Archanon-8 to come before the Circle of Heroes. Not that there was any doubt this would happen.
但与此同时，其他地方需要我的非凡才能。我受到召唤前往阿查农-8 号星，去往英雄议会，这是一件毫无疑问将会发生的事情。
Story message. Speaker: "Equis Denard" (Oathbound male) "Archanon-8" is the name of a planet. For "Circle of Heroes" see the corresponding glossary entry.

Oh, what a pleasant... well, it was not a surprise, apparently! I wish you the best of luck on this new journey, Equis Denard.[br/][br/]What does this mean for me, Vrascal? Has the Calling of Bravery ended?
哦，真是个好消息……好吧，这显然并不令人惊讶！祝你在新的旅程中一路顺风，德纳尔御骑。[br/][br/]这对我来说这意味着什么，瓦拉斯卡？勇气的召唤结束了吗？
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

The Calling of Bravery was first and foremost a test of skill and virtue. Every participant knew the possible reward was not the key. After Equis Burceau’s heroic death, it has been decided to suspend the competition. This doesn’t change your duties nor my role as observant. If all goes well, you too may still get invited to the Circle.
勇气召唤首先是对技能和美德的考验，所有参与者都知道，奖励并不是关键所在。布尔索御骑英勇牺牲之后，他们决定暂停比赛。但这不会改变你的职责，也不会改变我作为观察者的角色。如果一切顺利的话，你也有可能得到邀请前往英雄议会。
Story message. Speaker: "Vrascal the Seer" (Oathbound, male)
Who’s that? Tryin’ to be a tough boy, ‘ey? Well guess what, I didn’t pimp the engine of my thresher to let a noob spoil the fun! Thrashing time!
是谁？假装自己很坚强，对吗？你猜怎么着，我可不是为了让菜鸟破坏乐趣才发动打谷机的引擎！打谷时间到！
Who’s that? Tryin’ to be a tough girl, ‘ey? Well guess what, I didn’t pimp the engine of my thresher to let a noob spoil the fun! Thrashing time!
是谁？假装自己很坚强，对吗？你猜怎么着，我可不是为了让菜鸟破坏乐趣才发动打谷机的引擎！打谷时间到！

Oh, so you thought I was only a doll that couldn’t think or talk? That’s what they all say! Don’t try to apologize; my memory disks know all the fetishes and perversions your human brain could devise. I’ve seen them all!
哦，所以你以为我只是一个不会思考也不会说话的人偶？他们都这么说！不要试图道歉，我的内存盘了解你那颗人类大脑所能设计出的所有迷信和变态想法。我可是吃过见过！
Story message. Speaker: "Emma-4" (in game unit, female android)
(The frog-like creature stares at you with its large empty eyes. It surely is bigger and less plushy than you remember from the vision. Just now it casually swallows a deer-fly. Guess who is next?)
（这只青蛙一样的生物用空洞的大眼睛盯着你看，它肯定比你在梦境中见到的那只更大，身上的毛也更多。它刚才漫不经心地吞下了一只鹿虻，猜猜下一个该谁了？）
I’ve confronted the embodiment of the toy from my dream, still none of it seems to make sense. Why would I feel sad about losing something I never possessed?
我已经面对了梦境中玩具的化身，但它似乎没有任何意义。我为什么会为失去从未拥有的东西而感到悲伤呢？
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
Do you? Not just your Celestian brothers and sisters have revoked their property…
是吗？不只是你的星神兄弟姐妹们废除过他们的财产……
Story message. Speaker: "Reverend Nacri" (Celestian Ascended Teacher unit, male)

You mean the dream was a reflection of my Paladin vow of humility? That it communicates my fear of giving up the few things I am still allowed to possess? I always valued the third noble command for protecting me from the corruption of wealth.
你是说，这个梦反映了我身为帕拉丁的谦卑誓言？想要传达我因为放弃了自己仍然可以拥有的为数不多的东西而带来的恐惧？一直以来，我都十分重视第三条圣令，因为它能保护我不受财富的腐化。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
It might have been. But it could just as well allude to a different, bigger mystery within your mind.[br/][br/]Rest now, Prentice {STR_LeaderFirstName}. The truth is made for the patient.
也许是吧，但它也可能暗示了你心中另一个更大的谜团。[br/][br/]休息一下吧，学徒{STR_LeaderFirstName}。真相是为耐心之人准备的。
Story message. Speaker: "Reverend Nacri" (Celestian Ascended Teacher unit, male)
No! Let go, you mean people! Don’t take me away from my mommy…
不！放开她，你们这些坏蛋！不要带走我的妈妈……

Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female) Spoken from the perspective of a young girl (it is a first person vision / dream), even if Aliuna is male because of player customization!
Prentice {STR_LeaderFirstName}! Wake up! You are only having a bad dream!
学徒{STR_LeaderFirstName}！醒醒！你只是在做恶梦！
Story message. Speaker: "Reverend Nacri" (Celestian Ascended Teacher unit, male)
Reverend Nacri? Did I contact you from my sleep? I didn’t know that was possible…
纳克里修士？我有在梦境中联系你吗？这不可能吧……
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
You are full of surprising talents, it seems. Now take a deep breath and tell me what you experienced within this new dream vision.
看来你还有很多惊人的天赋。深呼吸，告诉我你在这个新的梦境中经历了什么？
Story message. Speaker: "Reverend Nacri" (Celestian Ascended Teacher unit, male)

I was the same girl as last time, only a little bit older. It was a normal day, until the men in uniform came to our house. They had a long talk with my parents… and then they took me away from them! It was horrible!
我还是上次那个女孩，只是又长大了一点。本来是正常的一天，结果突然有一群穿着制服的人来到我们的房子，他们和我的父母长谈了一番……然后就把我从父母身边带走了！真可怕！
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
They said they would take me to a better place, where I would receive the same glittering implants that they’ve been wearing. But all I wanted was to stay with my parents!
他们说会带我去一个更好的地方，说我可以在那里接受和他们一样闪闪发光的植入物。但我只想和父母在一起！
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
Glittering implants you say? Are you sure your brain didn’t just project the Assembly threat to reassemble this planet onto your dreams?
你说闪光的植入物？你确定你的大脑并非只是在影射你在这个星球上遇到那些妄图进行改造行动的半机械人而已？
Story message. Speaker: "Reverend Nacri" (Celestian Ascended Teacher unit, male)
Yes, I am sure. They didn’t look like Assembly. Their cybernetic implants were far too sleek and pristine. I imagine it’s what the Paragon must have used before the Star Union fell.
不是，我确定。他们看起来不像半机械人，他们的神经机械植入物十分光亮，而且崭新无比。我猜那一定是完人在星际联盟崩溃前使用过的东西。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
Pre-collapse Paragon? Very curious. But if you want to find out more, you will have to confront those reflections of your inner fears. Remember that a man’s greatest enemy can be his own mind.
大崩溃之前的完人？真是奇怪。不过，如果你想了解更多，就必须战胜内心恐惧的影射。记住，一个人最大的敌人很可能就是他自己的思想。
Story message. Speaker: "Reverend Nacri" (Celestian Ascended Teacher unit, male)
Face the figures from your dream to learn about and conquer your own fears.
面对梦境中的人物，了解并克服自己的恐惧。

I think I am beginning to understand. As an orphan, the Celestian order was the only family I ever knew. I didn’t realize it until now, but I never truly got over leaving you all behind when I started my training as an Oathbound Paladin. If the first dream represented my fear of losing property, this one clearly represents my fear of losing the people I care about.
我想我开始明白了。我是一个孤儿，星神修会是我唯一熟知的家庭，直到现在我才意识到这一点。然而，当我成为誓约者帕拉丁并开始接受训练时，我把你们全都抛在了身后，对此我到现在也没能真正释怀。如果说第一个梦境代表了我对失去财产的恐惧，那么这个梦则清楚地代表了我对失去自己关心之人的恐惧。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
Very good! You are slowly exploring the hidden regions of your mind. It is a journey that can become a part of who you are for the rest of your life.
很好！你正在慢慢探索自己头脑中的隐藏区域，这段旅程或许将陪伴你的余生。
Story message. Speaker: "Reverend Nacri" (Celestian Ascended Teacher unit, male)

But one thing still truly scares me: it can’t be normal that my dreams start taking physical form in such ways, can it? Summoning denizens of the Abyss is something only followers of the Psynumbra should be able to do.
但还有一件事依然困扰着我：我的梦境开始以这种方式获得现实的形态，这并不正常，不是吗？只有赛努布拉的追随者才能召唤深渊的住民。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

Is it summoning, or is it attracting? Evil can seek out the innocent, especially when they show signs of remarkable psionic talents such as you do. Stay cautious, Prentice {STR_LeaderFirstName}. Stay vigilant. The light of the Celestian path will not fail you.
这是召唤，还是吸引？邪恶总会找上无辜之人，特别是当他们像你一样表现出非凡灵能天赋之时。谨慎前行，学徒{STR_LeaderFirstName}。保持警惕，星神之路的光芒不会让你失望。
Story message. Speaker: "Reverend Nacri" (Celestian Ascended Teacher unit, male)

…but I don’t want to solve the conflict between the Outlanders and Terratech. This game is too hard! I want to play a real game with real friends! Not sit around your lifeless holograms. All they ever want is exercise, exercise, exercise…
……但我不想解决这些拓荒者和泰拉科技之间的冲突。这个游戏太难了！我想和真正的朋友玩真正的游戏！而不是坐在你的这些毫无生气的全息投影旁，他们只想要练习、练习、还是练习……

Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female) Spoken from the perspective of a young girl (it is a first person vision / dream), even if Aliuna is male because of player customization! For "Outlanders" and "Terratech" see the corresponding glossary entries.
PATIENCE. AS FUTURE EMPRESS YOU HAVE TO UNDERSTAND THE NEEDS OF THE CITIZENS. ONCE YOU HAVE LEARNED ENOUGH TO ASCEND THE THRONE, YOU WILL HAVE AS MANY FRIENDS AS YOU COULD DESIRE.
耐心点。身为未来的女皇，你必须了解公民的需求。等你学会了足够的知识，并登上了王位，你想要多少朋友就有多少朋友。
Story message. Speaker: "CORE" (AI, genderless, see corresponding glossary entry)
But I want friends now, not when I am too old to play! You told me an Empress doesn’t have time to play ball anymore.[br/][br/]Can’t somebody else become Empress? Please?
但我现在就想要朋友，再长大点就没有办法玩耍了！你说过成为女皇之后就没有时间玩乐了。[br/][br/]你就不能让别人成为女皇吗？拜托了！

Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female) Spoken from the perspective of a young girl (it is a first person vision / dream), even if Aliuna is male because of player customization!
ALIUNA. YOU ARE SPECIAL. YOUR GENETIC CODE IS SPECIAL. ONLY ONE IN A TRILLION IS COMPATIBLE. THE STAR UNION NEEDS YOU. I NEED YOU. I WILL BE HERE TO GIVE YOU ALL THAT YOU WISH FOR. JUST BE PATIENT...
艾留娜。你很特别。你的基因序列很特别。万亿人中才只有你一个。星际联盟需要你。我需要你。我会尽力满足你所有的愿望。只要你耐心一点……
Story message. Speaker: "CORE" (AI, genderless, see corresponding glossary entry) "Aliuna" is the child name of Empress Carminia.
…[br/][br/]Reverend Nacri? I had another dream, more life-like and intense than the others. I… the girl was talking with an AI system. They were connected through a neurological link.
……[br/][br/]纳克里修士？我又做了一个梦，这个梦比之前的梦更生动，也更强烈。我，不对……那个女孩在和一个人工智能系统对话，他们通过某种神经技术联系在一起。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

It seems that your dreams are continuing the story of the girl that was taken away from her parents. Whether she only existed within your visions is hard to tell at this point. But I already know that you want to find out.
看来你的梦还在继续，还是那个被人从父母身边带走的女孩的故事。她是否只存在于你的想象，现在还很难说。但我已经明白，你很想查证此事。
Story message. Speaker: "Reverend Nacri" (Celestian Ascended Teacher unit, male)
Yes! I must face this third challenge of shadows! Not just for myself, but also for her, the girl who may have lived and deserves to be remembered.
是的！我必须面对阴影带给我的这第三个挑战！不仅是为了我自己，也为了她，那个可能还活着的女孩，那个值得被记住的女孩。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
Face the figures from your dream to learn about and conquer your own fears.
面对梦境中的人物，了解并克服自己的恐惧。
Prentice {STR_LeaderFirstName}, you have faced the darkness and once more prevailed. What is it that you learned this time?
学徒{STR_LeaderFirstName}，你已经面对了黑暗并再次获得了胜利。这一次你学到了什么？
Story message. Speaker: "Reverend Nacri" (Celestian Ascended Teacher unit, male)

That I should not be afraid of other people’s expectations. It’s not just the Calling of Bravery or the commandments from the Code d’Equise: everyone’s lives contain trials and responsibilities. We can’t let our environment dictate who we are, but must find it within us to accept our own flaws and mistakes.
我不应该畏惧别人对我的期望，不仅是因为勇气的召唤，也不仅是因为《御骑法典》的法令：每个人的生命都有考验与责任。我们不能让自身周围的环境决定我们的本性，而是必须努力探寻并接受自身的缺点和错误。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
Spoken with the wisdom of an authentic Celestian. Your progress makes me proud, even if that fact in itself evidently should not influence your actions.
你的言语符合一名真正星神追随者的智慧。你取得的进展让我感到骄傲，虽然这一事实本身显然不应该影响你的行动。
Story message. Speaker: "Reverend Nacri" (Celestian Ascended Teacher unit, male)
Thank you, Reverend. Now that I understand the different guises of my fears, do you think I will still learn more about the girl from my dreams and her fate?
谢谢你，修士大人。现在我已经明白了自身恐惧的不同伪装，你觉得我还应该继续了解那位梦境中的女孩以及她的命运吗？
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
I am certain of it. Your lives seem to be more intertwined than it first meets the eye.
当然，你们之间的联系似乎比表面上看来更加复杂。
Story message. Speaker: "Reverend Nacri" (Celestian Ascended Teacher unit, male)
The ones that uproot our saplings are returning in greater numbers. Wither, foul herbivores! Too long have you spread your roots near our gardens. Now you will taste the thorns of a rose!
又是你们！将我们的幼苗连根拔起的家伙竟然又回来了。枯萎吧，你们这些污秽的食草动物！你们在我们的花园中扎根太久了，现在就让你们尝尝玫瑰尖刺的味道！
Story message. Speaker: "Growth Mothernode" (growth faction leader, sentient plant)
Have we met before? You must mistake us; we don’t come with ill intentions – this all sounds like a big misunderstanding.
我们以前见过面吗？你肯定认错了。我们没有恶意，听上去我们之间有一个很大的误会。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

Our only mistake was to not grow wary of you devourers before. It seemed you were fostering our sprouts in your gardens of plenty. But then the harrowing “harvest” came, and our children were ended in slaughter, season after season. Now it is time for your own leaves to wilt.
我们唯一的错误，就是以前没有提防你们这些贪婪的家伙。你们看上去好像是在你们繁茂的花园里培育我们的嫩芽。然而，可怕的“收割”却骤然降临，我们的孩子遭到屠杀，一季又一季。现在，是时候让你们自己的叶子枯萎了。
Story message. Speaker: "Growth Mothernode" (growth faction leader, sentient plant)

Sentient plants on a planet built for farming… this will be problematic. I am not sure yet how to convince them of our good intentions, but there has to be a way. Until we find out more, we have to defend ourselves against these vengeful vines.
为了农耕事业而建立的星球上居然有感知植物……这可是个大问题。我不知道应该如何让它们相信我们的善意，但必须得想个办法。在这之前，我们必须保护自己不受这些复仇藤蔓的伤害。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
We don’t indulge in your offerings, false symbiont. You weeded out our kind, now we uproot yours!
我们不会满足于你的条件，虚伪的共生者。你消灭了我们的同类，现在我们要将你连根拔起！
Story message. Speaker: "Growth Mothernode" (growth faction leader, sentient plant)

Unidentified Dvar contingent, this is {STR_LeaderName} of the Oathbound. We have detected your presence on our sensors, with Xenoplague signatures in the same location. Are you under attack and in need of help?
身份不明的矮人部队，我是誓约者的{STR_LeaderName}。我们在传感器上发现了你们的存在，并且在相同的位置还发现了异星疫病的信号。你们是否遭受攻击？是否需要帮助？
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

Oh, we didn’t realize this planet was inhabited, or we would have introduced ourselves earlier. Please don’t be alarmed by our forces carrying Xenoplague technology. We are using it strictly for non-military purposes.
哦，我们不知道这个星球上有人居住，不然我们肯定会自报家门的。是我们的部队正在携带异星疫病技术，但请不要担心，我们保证严格将其用于非军事目的。
You are employing Xenoplague technology? This sounds too dangerous to have near our borders. We have enough rampant mutants lurking within our domain already...
你们在使用异星疫病技术？这对我们的边境来说太危险了，我们的领地里已经潜伏着够多的猖獗突变体了……
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

Exactly! With all its genetically altered fauna and flora, this planet is the ideal testing chamber for my research. You must understand: we Dvar have been reliant on our environmental suits for so long that we have lost the ability to live without them. I am trying to find a cure for this “condition”.
完全正确！这个星球上的动植物都经过基因改造，是我理想中的测试实验室。你得知道，一直以来我们都依赖于环境防护服，甚至没有防护服我们就活不下去。所以，我正在努力寻找解决这一“状况”的办法。

You mean you would die if you left your suits? How horrible! I need my own battlesuit to survive in combat, so I can relate.[br/][br/]I would be willing to help you find your cure. But the spread of the Xenoplague needs to stay controlled and under my supervision.
你是说，如果你们脱下防护服就会死？真可怕！不过我也必须穿着机甲才能在战斗中生存下来，因此我能理解。[br/][br/]我愿意帮助你们找到解决方法，但异星疫病的传播必须得到控制并在我的监督之下进行。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

You would take charge of this? As you wish, {STR_LeaderName}. I have created a somewhat more… docile Pustule, which is capable of collecting DNA samples from different species and merging them into its own genetic profile. The first target species is the Growth.
你会负责这件事？如你所愿，{STR_LeaderName}。我已经创造了一个更加……温顺的脓疱，它能够收集不同物种的 DNA 样本，并将其融合到自己的基因档案中。第一个目标物种是灵植。
Story message. Speaker: "Inessa Zhelezo" (Dvar, female) "Pustule" is the name of a Xenoplague unit.
A header name of a task.
Send the Pustule unit you received into combat with the Growth and collect the DNA of fallen Growth units by using the Pustule's "Extract Growth DNA" ability.
将获得的脓疱单位与灵植战斗，并使用脓疱的“提取灵植 DNA”技能来收集阵亡的灵植单位的 DNA。
A task description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.

Very good! The DNA from the Growth will allow us to regain our sensitivity, so we can perceive the world again in its multifarious beauty.[br/][br/]Don’t be concerned if you see the sampling unit... changing. It is simply utilizing the new genetic material.
很好！灵植的 DNA 能使我们重新找回感知能力，这样我们就能再次感知这个世界多彩的美丽了。[br/][br/]如果你看到取样单位发生了某种……变化，请不要担心，它只是在利用新的遗传物质而已。
This seems highly dangerous, Director Inessa. I hope you are sure enough that this is meant to happen… What will be our next step?
这看起来十分危险，伊涅萨领袖。希望这一切还在你的掌控之中……下一步是什么？
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
The next target species are the Hopperhounds. Their DNA should grant us the physical strength to stand on our own feet again.
下一个目标物种是跳蝗，它们的 DNA 应该能给予我们用自己的双脚站立的力量。
Send the Destroyer unit you received into combat with the Hopperhounds and collect the DNA of fallen Hopperhound units by using the Destroyer's "Extract Hopperhound DNA" ability.
将获得的毁灭者单位与跳蝗战斗，并使用毁灭者的“提取跳蝗 DNA”技能来收集阵亡的跳蝗单位的 DNA。
A task description. "Destroyer" is the name of a Xenoplague unit.
A task description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
Great work {STR_LeaderName}, the research unit is adapting well to the new DNA it absorbed! Don’t be alarmed about the extra legs, and it now being a towering monstrosity…
干得漂亮，{STR_LeaderName}。研究单位正在适应它新吸收的 DNA！不要在意它多长出来的腿，也不要担心它现在魁梧的体型……
Director Inessa, this research thing you have me traipsing around is calling itself a Plague Lord! This is the most unscientific science I have ever seen.
伊涅萨领袖，你让我带着到处闲逛的这个玩意儿自称是疫病领主！这是我见过的最不科学的科学。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female) "Plague Lord" is the name of a Xenoplague unit.

Unconventional problems require unconventional methods. We are almost there! The last target species are the Mycelians. Their DNA will strengthen our immune system and let us adapt to the environment with its ever-changing hazards.
非常规问题需要非常规方法。我们就快完成了！最后一个目标物种是菌丝体，它们的 DNA 能够增强我们的免疫系统，让我们适应千变万化的危险环境。
Send the Plague Lord unit you received into combat with the Mycelians and collect the DNA of fallen Mycelian units by using the Plague Lord's "Extract Mycelian DNA" ability.
将获得的疫病领主单位与菌丝体战斗，并使用疫病领主的“提取菌丝体 DNA”技能来收集阵亡的菌丝体单位的 DNA。
{INT_0}/{INT_1} 收集菌丝体单位的 DNA
A task description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
A task description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
My Paladins are getting increasingly uneasy being around this lumbering genetic horror. I believe you can be trusted with it, Director Inessa. Just take it away!
我的帕拉丁在这个笨拙的基因造物附近变得越来越不安。我想我可以把它托付给你了，伊涅萨领袖。快把它拿走吧！
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

Thank you for overseeing this research, {STR_LeaderFirstName} of the Oathbound. We won’t forget all your help here. I only need a small tissue sample, so you can keep Mr Slimy. It seems to have grown accustomed to your genetic scent anyway.
谢谢你监督这项研究，誓约者的{STR_LeaderFirstName}，我们不会忘记你在这里提供的帮助。我只需要一小块组织样本就行，这位滑溜溜先生你可以自己留着，而且它似乎已经习惯了你的基因气味。
Mr... Slimy? I won’t even ask. Well the Oathbound honor all fellow combatants, even those as unconventional as Mr Slimy.
滑溜溜……先生？罢了，誓约者会尊敬所有的战斗伙伴，包括像滑溜溜先生这样不同寻常的战友。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

Good. But now I have to prepare my body for the DNA injection. After what happened the last time, I cannot account for using anybody else as testing subject. If all goes well, we will meet again as equals breathing the same fresh air.
很好。但是现在我必须做好准备为我的身体注射 DNA 了。在经历了上次的事情之后，我不能再用其他人的身体作为测试对象了。如果一切顺利的话，我们将再次相遇，并呼吸着同样的新鲜空气。

The smells, the colors – I feel like I’m reborn as an entirely different being! But what is this? Why are those insects badgering my skin? Why does the sun burn my face just for the wind to freeze it? The conflicting sensations are assailing every part of my body – it is all too overpowering and unrelenting!
气味和色彩，我感觉像是以一个完全不同的躯体重生了！但这是什么？那些昆虫为什么缠着我的皮肤不放？为什么太阳会晒伤我的脸，而风却又把它给冻住了？这种相互冲突的感觉冲击着我身体的每一个部位。太强烈了！无休无止！

No, I must return to my DV-R suit, breathe its comforting and predictable stale air, calm my eyes with the digital readouts from my visor… I never realized how much stress and horror ordinary races constantly receive from their environment. It was foolish of me to seek changing my existence to something… less.
不，我必须回到我的 DV-R 防护服中去，呼吸那舒适而可预测的浑浊空气，用护目镜上的数字读数让眼睛平静下来……我从来没有想到，普通种族竟然会从环境中受到如此的压力和恐怖感觉。我太愚蠢了，居然想要改变自己的生活……
Are you sure you want to turn back now, after everything you have accomplished? Our existence isn’t all that bad once you had time to get accustomed to it…
你确定已经走到这一步了，还要回头吗？一旦你适应了我们的生活，就不会觉得那么糟糕了……
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

Yes, I am certain. But it’s not all for the worse. My research may have been folly, but it made me appreciate my own nature again. As Dvar I have tempered and tamed all the unpleasantries other races must endure day by day. I am one of the lucky ones.
是的，我确定。但这也并不全是坏事，我的研究可能很愚蠢，但却让我再次领会到了自己的本性。身为矮人，我已经缓和并制服了其他所有种族每天必须忍受的不悦，我真是幸运。
Oh, no! You have lost Mr Slimy! This is setting back my research for many months to come…
哦，不！你失去了滑溜溜先生！这会使我的研究推迟好几个月……

I am sorry about your loss and apologize for my own heedlessness. But there are many lives at stake on this planet, and I can’t put them at further risk with something as erratic and infectious as the Xenoplague. I’m afraid your research has to stop. Also: Mr Slimy? I won’t even ask...
我对你的损失感到遗憾，并为我的疏忽道歉。但在这个星球上，有许多生命正处于危险之中，我不能让他们因为异星疫病这样不稳定且具有传染性的存在而面临进一步的风险。恐怕你的研究应该到此为止了。还有，滑溜溜先生？算了……
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

I can understand your skepticism, {STR_LeaderFirstName} of the Oathbound. Maybe, once the situation here has been stabilized, we can talk about this subject once more. Until then I will honor your request to put our experiments on hold.
我能理解你的怀疑，{STR_LeaderFirstName}。也许等这里的情况稳定下来，我们可以再讨论一下这个话题。在那之前，我会尊重你的要求，暂停我们的实验。
It’s just a flesh wound… Trust me, I’ve been through worse! I... uh… just need to sleep. Yes, a long nap at our headquarters should restore to me my strength. It has worked before!
只是皮肉伤而已……相信我，我经历过更糟的！我……呃……只需要睡一会就行。没错，我在总部睡上一觉应该就能恢复体力，以前都是这样的！
Story message. Speaker: "Ashlan of Norzedaal" (Oathbound, male)
Vrascal, no! Your insight and knowledge let you predict the fates of many, yet you were not destined to foresee your own death.
瓦拉斯卡，不！你的洞察力和知识预见了许多人的命运，但你却注定不能预见自己的死亡。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)
With my judge of honor dead, I have forfeited the trust of the Circle of Heroes. The High Paladius is sending one of the Circle’s members to take over and lead this planet to a better future.
我的荣誉判官死了，我辜负了英雄议会的信任。圣帕拉迪乌斯正派遣另一名议会成员前来接管这个星球，并领导它走向更美好的未来。
Story message. Speaker: "Aliuna Lyonesse" (Oathbound, can be both male or female)

Examinee {STR_LeaderFirstName}, your actions don’t speak well of you. Where there should be virtue, I see sin and where there should be mercy, I see punishment. I relieve you of your duties as Equis of this planet. You will now revert to being an Aspirant.
试炼者{STR_LeaderFirstName}，你的行为出卖了你。在应该展现美德的地方，我看到了罪恶，而在应该展现仁慈的地方，我却看到了惩罚。在此，我解除你作为这个星球御骑的职责，并把你降级为候补者。
Story message. Speaker: "Vrascal the Seer" (Oathbound, male)
I should have known that your speeches of peace and prosperity were only empty words. The last time our Consortium trusted such noble promises we paid for that mistake in blood.
我早该料到你那些关于和平与繁荣的说辞不过是空话而已。我们的财团上一次相信如此高尚的承诺时，就为这个错误付出了血的代价。

My father was slain by the Shakarn while he defended the ELOP headquarters. What did our ELOP allies do? They cuddled up with the alien invaders shortly afterwards, the losses of the Zhelezo Consortium unavenged and forgotten.
我的父亲在保卫星球平等联盟总部时遭到蜥蜴人杀害，而我们的盟友做了什么？不久之后，他们与外星侵略者狼狈为奸，将泽勒佐财团的损失置于不管不顾的地位。
Story message. Speaker: "Inessa Zhelezo" (Dvar, female) For "ELOP" see the corresponding glossary entry.

I have no interest in crossing hammers with your mechanized behemoths, {STR_LeaderFirstName}. I abhor your two-faced tactics, but will withdraw nevertheless. The next time the sun sets you will find no Zhelezo Dvar on this planet.
我没有兴趣和你们这些机械巨兽纠缠，{STR_LeaderFirstName}。虽然我憎恨你两面三刀的策略，但我还是会离开这里。等到下次太阳下山之际，你将不会再在这个星球上看到任何一名泽勒佐矮人的身影。
